856803972610482176.text: "Let him rest in peace, we will never forget him, long live the Republic and long live France" @fhollande

856803893493342208.text: @ fhollande "Let him know that after him, others will rise to pursue what he has committed to freedom and human dignity"

856803758294138880.text: "He was a man of heart and honor and became a policeman by conviction" @fhollande

856803680905023488.text: "Today, the whole nation expresses its deep gratitude and gratitude to Captain Jugelé" @fhollande

856803592963018752.text: "The Republic is the promise to every citizen to live free and safe" @fhollande

856803505692176385.text: "France is a great and beautiful cause worth fighting for, devoting, dying for it" @fhollande

856803408761802752.text: . @ fhollande "Police officers lost their lives in the face of terrorism but have entered our collective memory and are examples"

856803231904784384.text: "This fight will be long and difficult but, I am sure, victorious, it requires unity and responsibility" @fhollande

856803146638786561.text: . @ fhollande "It's a long fight that France leads inside and outside"

856802997355065344.text: "What is expected is consistency, perseverance, consistency rather than outbidding and ruptures" @fhollande

856802862218846212.text: . @ fhollande "We must provide them with the means to act even more effectively"

856802761299693568.text: @ fhollande "Support police and gendarmes, they have the right to our esteem, our solidarity, our admiration for the danger"

856802628419899392.text: "He was a policeman aware of his mission, a citizen committed to many causes." @fhollande

856802511361110016.text: "The police was his life but he had a life out of the police, he was curious, he loved people, art, felt like a citizen of the world"

856802414833389568.text: "He wanted to be more involved in international cooperation, he was eager to join his new assignment" @fhollande

856802252807340032.text: "We are here as witnesses, this concert is to celebrate life," he said at the reopening of the Bataclan @fhollande

856802044170166273.text: "The police are in the image of society." @fhollande

856802009705525248.text: . @ fhollande "Within the national police, he was committed to equality, he was campaigning for the Flag association."

856801807397531648.text: "He was deeply convinced of the social role of the police among the most vulnerable" @fhollande

856801719900155905.text: @ fhollande "Xavier believed in equality, he was attentive to the most vulnerable"

856801633841426432.text: "For 6 years, he was a guardian of peace, he saw security as the first freedom" @fhollande

856801528107204608.text: "Xavier was brave, he did not back down in the face of danger." @fhollande

856801360129515520.text: @ fhollande "His old comrades remember a man always available, in a good mood, anxious to serve well"

856801234694664192.text: "It is to safeguard the freedom that Xavier has engaged in the police" @fhollande

856801158500896769.text: @ fhollande "Xavier Jugelé defended values, Republican laws, they guided his whole life."

856801033959428096.text: @ fhollande "I want to say in the name of the Nation that we share your sadness and your anger, your sorrow is that of the Republic"

856800807043387392.text: . @ fhollande "That makes odious the acts of violence against you, they must be repressed with the utmost severity"

856800701678325760.text: "In your job, all tasks are important, you play a vital role in preserving civil peace" @fhollande

856800577950535681.text: "By their coolness, they advanced under fire and managed to neutralize it without damage to the crowd" @fhollande

856800466541432834.text: . @ fhollande "The captain was a daily hero like his colleagues who were with him and faced a terrorist"

856800329299619840.text: "I associate with this tribute the 2 police officers affected last Thursday" @fhollande

856800245291913217.text: . @ fhollande "Last year, 8 police officers and 14 gendarmes died in the line of duty"

856800134029594624.text: . @ fhollande "Everyone has seen for several years that steps have been taken in the violence that the police are confronted with.

856799994011111424.text: "Xavier was 37. He died on the Champs-Elysees when his fate crossed a hateful fanatic" @fhollande

856799740113104896.text: "We are here to share the grief of his parents, his family, his spouse, his colleagues and by addressing all the French"

856799664049451008.text: @ fhollande "We are gathered this morning to pay tribute to Xavier Judge"

856560216049152000.text: "Know that between us an indestructible bond of friendship has been created since all this time.This is the bond of fraternity" @fhollande

856560002114498562.text: "During my years as head of state, I had only one concern, that France never shirk its responsibilities" @fhollande

856559033720987648.text: "In the face of human rights violations around the world, April 24 reminds us that we must act" #Argenian Genocide @fhollande

856558617109172225.text: "Armenian Genocide Forensic Archives Commission will be established" @fhollande

856558407607873539.text: "France, on every occasion, must tell Turkey that there has been genocide and that this genocide must be recognized" @fhollande

856557657091690496.text: "Negationism is not an opinion, it is the negation of a truth, of a reality" @fhollande

856557521397575681.text: "It is up to me to say that we must not forget to take the path of the negationist's penalization" @fhollande

856556931133079552.text: "Only the truth can reconcile and gather" @fhollande

856556760139784195.text: "We will never stop talking about the Armenian genocide, we can not let revisionism speak" @fhollande

856556397298946055.text: "It is this solidarity of France towards the Armenian people that I wanted to recall while going to Armenia" @fhollande

856555734225629184.text: "Great consciences rose a century ago against the genocide" @fhollande

856555590167998464.text: "The fight for memory is a major act, to fight, to refuse all the distortions of history" @fhollande

856555456193597446.text: "We must call for civic mobilization and republican vigilance" @fhollande

856555235963273218.text: "I wanted to be among you for this meditation in memory of the victims of the Armenian Genocide" @fhollande

847917435827220482.text: Revisiting President @fhollande's speech on Europe during the 3rd session of the "Think Tanks Tandem" initiative https://t.co/cUcVyAbFBz

847899218400481280.text: "Europe must seize the big questions of the world Let us not believe that Europe has not moved forward" @fhollande #TTTandem

847898148395782144.text: "Europeans must convince themselves that they weigh in the world and that they must not let others dispose of the world" @fhollande

847897742504583169.text: "The need for Europe is very strong Europe is expected to play a role in the regulation of the world" @fhollande #TTTandem

847896752376229890.text: "I think there is always a chance in adversity because it is in these moments that we think back to what unites the Europeans"

847896366743519233.text: "It is very important that we show that Europe at 27 will stay on course or even boost the pace" @fhollande #TTTandem

847895774075793408.text: "We must acknowledge that this Brexit is final to ensure that we can have a good negotiation" @fhollande #TTTandem

847895528276930560.text: "Brexit is an irreversible decision, nothing would be more dangerous than to think that this decision could be taken by another Gvt"

847895090899148800.text: "We must not only deplore the Brexit: we have to take note that the United Kingdom will leave" @fhollande #TTTandem

847894511703523328.text: "Brexit is a defeat for the United Kingdom but also for the European spirit" @fhollande #TTTandem

847892931222667264.text: "The only thing that unites us is the internal market, the spirit and the European model as well as our values" @fhollande #TTTandem

847892516930281472.text: "For a long time it was thought that all countries would be members of the zone € and that they should be associated with this process" @fhollande #TTTandem

847892147185606656.text: "The 3rd challenge is the pace of European construction" @fhollande #TTTandem

847890600078839812.text: "The European idea is the idea of ​​compromise, it does not mean that we have to give up a balance of power" @fhollande #TTTandem

847889973009317888.text: "Otherwise, national selfishness will continue to be exacerbated and will eventually dislocate the European Union" @fhollande #TTTandem

847889715906961408.text: "We must tell these countries that they can not receive and give nothing, we must call to this spirit of solidarity" @fhollande

847889207913840640.text: "We have it during the eurozone crisis, but especially during the refugee crisis" @fhollande #TTTandem

847888669537120259.text: "There was, what could be feared, the resurgence of national feelings of nationalism and national egoism" @fhollande #TTTandem

847888246122172417.text: "The mistake, no doubt, was to think that nations were going to fade, identities become common" @fhollande #TTTandem

847887894350102530.text: "2nd challenge: what is Europe's place in relation to nations?" @fhollande #TTTandem

847886977848545280.text: "But Europe can not just be a market, citizens must also recognize themselves in Europe" @fhollande #TTTandem

847886623790575621.text: "I recall that Europe is the world's leading economic and commercial power" @fhollande #TTTandem

847886293141008385.text: "The first challenge for Europe is: will we be able to preserve the European model?" @fhollande #TTTandem

847885692634005506.text: "Europe responds well to the questions ms svt late which gives public opinion the feeling that it is not at the RDV" @fhollande

847884984652312577.text: "Europe has always had to experience crises, + or - serious, but it has been able to overcome them all" @fhollande #TTTandem

847884747753881601.text: "It was important, especially in Rome, to reaffirm the common destiny of Europe" @fhollande #TTTandem # EU60

847884493260238848.text: "The other crisis that has occurred is the Brexit, which could call into question solidarity and European cohesion" @fhollande #TTTandem

847884009875136513.text: "How can it be imagined that 5 million people can not, at one time or another, sweep across Europe?" @fhollande #TTTandem

847883473666932739.text: "The refugee crisis comes next with the consequences of the wars that are on our doorstep: Iraq, Syria ..." @fhollande #TTTandem

847883134846873602.text: "Europe needed answers, in Minsk France & Germany sought a way out of the crisis" @fhollande #TTTandem

847882730700451842.text: "Then there was the crisis in Ukraine, which challenged established principles that were the inviolability of borders" @fhollande

847882171977170945.text: "If we could get out of this crisis, it's because the main countries were willing to find a compromise" @fhollande #TTTandem

847881769361780737.text: "There was, for a number of countries, and even France, a risk of sidelining the eurozone" @fhollande #TTTandem

847881420001378305.text: "The question was: can the eurozone still remain consistent and could withstand the pressures?" @fhollande #TTTandem

847881103251820548.text: "When I came to the responsibilities in 2012, we were still fully in the crisis of the euro zone" @fhollande #TTTandem

847880780403679232.text: "In this context, I have always argued that Europe should move forward with steps and vision" @fhollande #TTTandem

847880465159774208.text: "There are far-right and far-left European political families who are hired for an outing" @fhollande #TTTandem

847880234468814849.text: "If it was only in France, we could blame ourselves but a country decided to leave the European Union" @fhollande #TTTandem

847879968235429889.text: "In this campaign, there is a lot of voices rising against Europe and asking to leave" @fhollande #TTTandem

847879678207680515.text: "Imagine changing Europe seems to me to be the worst method and offers a lot for those who do not want it" @fhollande #TTTandem

847879215395590145.text: "You have to be European, but to be fully, realistically, you have to change certain orientations of Europe" @fhollande

847878222968750080.text: "I conceived all my political life with Europe, never without, and even less against" @fhollande #TTTandem

836923202400026624.text: "In 5 years, Uruguay, Costa Rica, Mexico & Argentina have become observer members of the @ OIFfrancophonie" @fhollande

836922980873744385.text: "@ AFD_France has just opened an office in Cuba and soon in Argentina and will double the ceiling of its commitments by 2020" @fhollande

836922925844414465.text: "The EU, Latin America and the Caribbean can and must build a structuring partnership" @fhollande

836922498457415682.text: "We support a trade agreement between the EU and Mercosur to boost our trade" @fhollande

836922253929562112.text: "On the economic front, France is supporting the sustained growth experienced by your continent in recent years" @fhollande

836921886026133506.text: @ fhollande also evokes the Franco-Cuban initiative to defend the rights of LGBT people, those with Chile & Mexico for women

836921551815593984.text: @ fhollande mentions the Franco-Argentine initiative to promote the convention on enforced disappearances.

836921195350147074.text: "The Peruvian presidency of COP20 has been fundamental and Mexico, Brazil, Saint Lucia, for example, have been facilitators"

836920615957315587.text: @ fhollande "Martinique, Guadeloupe, Saint-Barthélemy and Saint Martin are in the heart of the Caribbean"

836920420867657728.text: @ fhollande recalls the common border of Guyana with Brazil and Suriname.

836919858742837248.text: @ fhollande "I will always have great pleasure to meet you to talk about the future Latin America is a continent of the future"

836919575056957444.text: . @ fhollande "in 3 months, there will be the week of Latin America, initiatives will take place everywhere in France"

836919395037380608.text: "We hope that in compulsory education, a good place will be given to French to strengthen our links" @fhollande

836919013372538880.text: @ fhollande "we must all promote dialogue and multilateralism Regulatory mechanisms are useful to the world"

836918625118392320.text: "Argentina will chair the future G20 in 2018," recalls @fhollande

836918513306599424.text: "French investments in Latin America have doubled in 10 years" @fhollande

836918422562869250.text: . @ fhollande "With Costa Rica, we continue our fight for the universal abolition of the death penalty"

836918299480973312.text: "I welcome the Franco-Mexican initiative on limiting the right of veto to the Security Council in case of mass crimes" @fhollande

836917844571000832.text: . @ fhollande "130 states have ratified the climate agreement, no one can question it"

836917006842609665.text: . @ fhollande "since 2012, I wanted to give a new impetus to these relations"

836916733109661702.text: @ fhollande "we claim this place, we feel concerned by the political, climatic, affecting the region"

836916443706859521.text: . @ fhollande "France is a country of the American continent, even if many do not know it"

836607274235879425.text: @ fhollande "You have to believe in French genius In terms of infrastructure, France is the leader in the world"

836607078433230849.text: . @ fhollande "We do not do this only for France but also for Europe through the interconnection of networks"

836606996728188928.text: @ fhollande "We need to think France at 20, at 30, think about what we want to do for the territories."

836606824149307394.text: . @ fhollande "We need major projects, equipment, infrastructure. Since 2012, I wanted this national rail strategy"

836606446905274368.text: @ fhollande "2017 will also see the commissioning of 2 other TGV lines to Brittany and to the Mediterranean"

836606163802329088.text: @fhollande "This work is fully compatible with our commitments made at COP21."

836606065131257857.text: . @ fhollande "This will encourage travelers to prefer the train to the car and the plane."

836605937578311681.text: . @ fhollande "LGV will also enhance the attractiveness of the territories served and favor new business areas"

836605684061962241.text: . @ fhollande "Beyond @Bordeaux, all the territories will benefit from the commissioning of LGV"

836604969411362816.text: . @ fhollande "This project also allows local authorities to benefit from a considerable renovation"

836604654574239744.text: . @ fhollande "The public sector has contributed half of the funding"

836604307738923008.text: @ fhollande "It was necessary to adapt the concession to the new times with always a public will defined by the State"

836603916682919936.text: . @ fhollande "With outsourcing, 17,000 direct, indirect or induced jobs have been created by this project"

836603580081557504.text: @ fhollande "This book is a vector for job creation Some people would not have access to training without this project"

836603339722870784.text: . @ fhollande "I also want to acknowledge the strong involvement of @SNCFReseau.Commissioning will be advanced by one month.This is a performance."

836602986403102720.text: . @ fhollande "You have once again demonstrated the achievements of French engineering and public works companies"

836602789354700807.text: @ fhollande "This is an unprecedented book by its design and financing."

836602713509068801.text: "This is the largest civil engineering project in Europe, the largest concession in the world" @fhollande

836602561490636800.text: . @ fhollande "This is a considerable project that is finding its way out Bordeaux will be only 2 hours from Paris"

833704410446491648.text: "It's Europe that makes it possible to have a migration policy" @fhollande #Malaga

833704096033079297.text: "I want to show how much Europe is useful for controlling migration because it's Europe that allows controls" @fhollande #Malaga

833703202860175360.text: "In the name of Europe and France, we must refuse these solutions, everyone has to take responsibility, I will take them" @fhollande

833702804128669697.text: "The extremes are a false sovereignty that would translate into less employment, less growth and less freedom" @fhollande

833702548083191808.text: "We must denounce extremism, because what the nationalist movements propose is the exit of Europe, the withdrawal" @fhollande

833701840160165888.text: "We must put trust and strength to preserve Europe" @fhollande at the Franco-Spanish Summit of #Malaga

833701302752391168.text: "There are other powers that do not want Europe because Europe carries values, defines a unique model in the world." @fhollande

833701176508039168.text: "What threatens Europe is dilution, loss of meaning" @fhollande #Malaga

833700910022934528.text: "We must lead differentiated cooperation, go further with countries that want it" @fhollande #Malaga

833700585085992964.text: "We have three priorities for Europe: defense, security, prosperity" @fhollande #Malaga

833700467515482112.text: "The 60th anniversary of the Treaty of Rome is timely, what do we want to do together and what are our goals?" @fhollande

833700202112491524.text: "We have made a lot of effort and today the results are there, and growth has resumed" @fhollande #Malaga

833699891918536705.text: We convinced that we had to give a different meaning to the construction of Europe, so we decided the banking union @fhollande

833699481912741889.text: "Two friendly countries, two neighboring countries that have a responsibility to define the future of Europe" @fhollande #Malaga

833699117687771136.text: "We have infrastructure projects in common, highways and rail transport" @fhollande #Malaga

833698747456561152.text: "We have the same approach to the fight against terrorism, the seal is a good example of this collaboration" @fhollande

833698510327447552.text: "We have a particularly strong bilateral relationship with Spain, both economically and politically" @fhollande

833698183842770944.text: "Malaga, the birthplace of Picasso, is a symbol of what we have in common, the culture" @fhollande

833698025440690178.text: "I thank President @fhollande for being present, this summit has yielded fruitful results" @marianorajoy #Malaga

833697022897221632.text: "Europe must focus on the single market, energy, digital, key sectors for competitiveness" @marianorajoy

833696797897932800.text: "Europe must work on immigration, the fight against terrorism, external security and the struggle for employment" @marianorajoy

833696247840112641.text: "Europe is the world's leading economic power, the place that offers a welfare state" @marianorajoy #Malaga

833696041505587200.text: "With @fhollande, we talked about what we need to do to make the process of European integration evolve" @marianorajoy #Malaga

833695652970450944.text: "France and Spain are united by close and diverse ties, with centuries of shared history and a common future" @marianorajoy

832199322339045376.text: @ fhollande "I could see the personal investment of the elected officials, nothing would have been possible without them"

832199206597189636.text: @ fhollande "We need unity and unity, to prevent division from settling, of a policy for all."

832199068294209536.text: . @ fhollande "City policy is a policy of trust, which allows the mobilization of all and provides hope"

832198708892725249.text: @ fhollande "I wanted to tell you how proud I am to be welcomed as I have been by the people of this neighborhood, with such vitality"

832198381049090048.text: . @ fhollande "It's hard to promise everything to everyone. There must be redistribution at the territorial level"

832198209585967104.text: . @ fhollande "When I hear those who complain about declining endowments, they are often the same ones who are asking for savings"

832197844249481216.text: . @ fhollande "Consideration must be a key principle in public policy making"

832197656000749568.text: . @ fhollande "The first expectation of citizen councils was to be trained in the understanding of public policies"

832197192005857280.text: . @ fhollande "Fighting against discrimination is also one of my priorities. Exemplarity must be everywhere, let alone at the top of the state.

832196877193969665.text: . @ fhollande "We must continue this policy because it produces results, I salute companies that give young people a chance"

832196654442901505.text: . @ fhollande "I measure the expectation of those who are excluded from the labor market Youth unemployment has decreased by 10%"

832196550113767424.text: . @ fhollande "For the second consecutive year, the unemployment rate is decreasing in France but I measure the frustration of many."

832196391892111365.text: . @ fhollande "It is in the neighborhoods that there is the most vitality in business creation"

832196304310792192.text: @ fhollande "We need to promote professional integration and business creation."

832196237373931520.text: @ fhollande "An additional chance must be given to young people in working-class neighborhoods."

832196109946802176.text: @ fhollande "I wanted a training program for young people, like the big school of digital"

832196015340007424.text: . @ fhollande "Let's apply the existing laws, give the security forces the means, that's what we have to do"

832195892069404672.text: @ fhollande "The Republic must not discriminate against any of its children."

832195726612557824.text: @ fhollande "We must show responsibility, justice is seized and must go to the end, we must have confidence"

832195601383186433.text: . @ fhollande "The concern for respect for people and their dignity must be permanent"

832195498203295744.text: . @ fhollande "It's not enough to recruit, you also have to train staff to deal with crime"

832195384021749761.text: . @ fhollande "Investing in neighborhoods means ensuring they can live in safety, hence the priority security zones"

832195224080363520.text: . @ fhollande "Investing in neighborhoods also means having businesses"

832194998170947584.text: . @ fhollande "We wanted to set up large regional cultural establishments in connection with schools"

832194907980853251.text: . @ fhollande "Investing in these neighborhoods also means valuing culture. From an early age, an initiation can change a route"

832194761561927680.text: @ fhollande "Beauty, innovation, technology should not be reserved for the privileged."

832194626375278593.text: . @ fhollande "School is the condition of equal opportunities, so I asked the Mayor of Clichy to identify all local needs"

832194476869287936.text: . @ fhollande "We are making significant financial efforts and I have considered neighborhoods to be the priority for France"

832194284069724161.text: @ fhollande "I want to say to all those who are far from these neighborhoods that what is being done here is a symbol of the vitality of neighborhoods"

832193926937321474.text: . @ fhollande "No city contract can be decided without the citizen councils and the involvement of the inhabitants"

832193819806461953.text: . @ fhollande "We have created the citizens councils, more than 1100 today, to involve the population in the decisions"

832193648804630528.text: . @ fhollande "The law has created a new instrument: the city contract to unite all actors"

832193559122030597.text: @ fhollande "The politics of the city is not only in cities or large urban areas"

832193416205365249.text: @ fhollande "We have redefined the map of priority neighborhoods based on residents' incomes"

819254700327440384.text: President @fhollande inaugurated the renovated spaces of Richelieu at the BNF https://t.co/Ngprtm5xrq

819228385478119424.text: #directPR @fhollande "Nothing is ever completed, everything is transformed and continues to serve the French people"

819228243299598336.text: #directPR @fhollande "Democracy also means sharing science, culture Education is the condition of everything"

819228114735730688.text: #directPR @fhollande "This restoration is a rebirth and the confirmation of a vocation We must open our institutions"

819227969029885956.text: #directPR @fhollande "Those who created these great institutions wanted to make the works available to the general public"

819227835239985158.text: #directPR @fhollande "Our country promotes a culture open to the world, which promotes dialogue and sharing"

819227753673322496.text: #directPR @fhollande "Our responsibility is to defend the circulation of ideas around the world"

819227692952416256.text: #directPR @fhollande "We have a great responsibility because we are watched by every country in the world"

819227595225047041.text: #directPR @fhollande "Freedom is fragile, like democracy, it is never acquired."

819227463012257792.text: #directPR @fhollande "The ability of the French people to stand up for freedom must not be forgotten"

819227382586478593.text: #directPR @fhollande "Freedom has been called into question, culture has been targeted by terrorism, we must not forget anything about it."

819227154076540928.text: #directPR @fhollande "This inauguration coincides with a tragic anniversary, that of January 11th"

819227014502776832.text: #directPR @fhollande "It's not only an education in arts and culture but through arts and culture"

819226716317093889.text: #directPR @fhollande "What is at stake is the place given to culture There can be no will without artistic education"

819226444673019905.text: #directPR @fhollande "In 2017, I wanted to give a strong boost to the budget for culture."

819226309259919362.text: #directPR @fhollande "We need a single regulatory framework so that all players are on an equal footing"

819226182801616898.text: #directPR @fhollande "So we brought our proposals to the European Commission to define the new frameworks"

819226091609096192.text: #directPR @fhollande "Copyright is the keystone of the creative finance system - all fields are concerned"

819225971404472320.text: #directPR @fhollande "For the book, we must also accompany this mutation."

819225920389136384.text: #directPR @fhollande "The music industry is experiencing economic renewal thanks to streaming."

819225844870774784.text: #directPR @fhollande "Digital can be the best thing, but it has changed the mode of transmission of works"

819225740675870721.text: #directPR @fhollande "Publishing is the first French cultural export industry, even if it remains fragile"

819225465147838465.text: #directPR @fhollande "The government has set up a plan of 11 million to promote literary expression in these bookstores"

819225325334908931.text: #directPR @fhollande "Bookstores do public work, they are places of culture and sharing."

819225179759005697.text: #directPR @fhollande "I want to highlight the launch of the night of reading on January 14, 1200 events will be organized"

819224974099644416.text: #directPR @fhollande "We wanted to support this effort to disseminate reading and concern all territories"

819224686743711745.text: #directPR @fhollande "The topic of opening public libraries was important to me."

819224579012956162.text: #directPR @fhollande "A plan for reading was launched in 2014, especially to support communities"

819224349714550790.text: #directPR @fhollande "The idea was to gather all these libraries to maintain the link between the French and the book"

819223576997953536.text: #directPR @fhollande "The BNF watches over one of the most important collections in the world and is the guardian of our memory"

819223298215178240.text: #directPR @fhollande "From 2017 will begin the 2nd stage of work to give the whole of its amplitude to 2020"

819222710836404225.text: #directPR @fhollande "This is a € 230 million operation, 80% of which is committed by the Ministry of Culture and 20% by Education"

819222478027423744.text: #directPR @fhollande "It took 10 years for the decision to launch the work to be taken in 2006."

809789042325917696.text: President @fhollande spoke about the benefits of digital education https://t.co/0Jbttoetv0 #EcoleNumerique

809777011162017792.text: "Our dream is that in the next few years, all young people can benefit from a digital tool" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809776926047014913.text: "Digital is an educational issue, citizen, republican and cultural" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809776339649753088.text: "The challenge of the digital plan is Republican, to ensure that students have a critical reading of digital content" @fhollande

809776142043508736.text: "The digital plan has an educational ambition first, it's another chance for success" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809775893602299936.text: "We want the digital to integrate the students who are the most in trouble." It's a link "@fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809775531478622208.text: "The digital allows the individual accompaniment of each student and helps fight against inequalities" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809775347055099904.text: "The fight against inequality was the main part of our commitment to the launch of the Digital Plan" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809775134756270084.text: "The digital has transformed the relationship of teachers with students" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809775037561602048.text: "Thanks to the digital tool, we can learn better, better express what students can feel" @fhollande #CollegeNumerique

809774924273504256.text: "I want to greet the teachers for their mobilization for the use and the teaching of the digital" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809774290371493888.text: "We have set up training modules so that teachers can make full use of the digital tool" @fhollande

809774116140122112.text: "Digital at school is a possibility offered to students through teachers" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809773990768181248.text: "It is not enough to set up equipment, we must give training to teachers" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809773795162673156.text: "I launched in 2015 with @najatvb the digital plan for education" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

809773466375356417.text: "The school must transmit and for that use all that the digital tool can allow it to do" @fhollande # Ecole Numérique

809773310842171393.text: "We must prepare today's young people for the jobs of tomorrow" @fhollande #EcoleNumerique

808668465427021824.text: "I want to salute this Franco-German alliance on digital" @fhollande https://t.co/HdKIIbADMQ

808653088055840768.text: "France and Germany live up to their responsibilities for Europe as a whole in digital" #DirectPR

808652920094937088.text: "The state must accompany transformations and forge new security" #DirectPR

808652822669565953.text: "Ecological and digital transitions offer this vision that Europe must defend" #DirectPR

808652700351086597.text: "We need a medium and long-term strategy: if we want Europe to lead people, we need a vision." #DirectPR

808652582377914368.text: "We want to create a large digital market across Europe, support companies and provide the best services"

808652437980639232.text: "I welcome the progress of the end of roaming charges thanks to the European Commission" #DirectPR

808652359412908032.text: "France has already initiated tax adjustments for multinationals, this policy must be carried out on a European scale"

808652250839220224.text: "The European Commission has made great progress on the status of the collaborative economy and the harmonization of tax rules"

808652078981808129.text: #DirectPR "We work together for a European regulation to protect personal data"

808651922194518016.text: "We have launched a program to make digital checks available to SMEs to accelerate their transition" #DirectPR

808651788899512320.text: "In France, we have created a large decentralized digital school to recruit all talents" #DirectPR

808651670888583168.text: "We want to be able to train employees in the industries of the future." Youth training needs to be expanded "#DirectPR

808651480093822976.text: "We will launch alliances for the industry of the future to promote digital transition for all businesses" #DirectPR

808651330151649280.text: "Our responsibility is to prepare for the future We must be a driving force in the digital world" #DirectPR

808651193669001216.text: "I want to salute this Franco-German alliance on digital" #DirectPR

808651135867293696.text: #DirectPR "Computing and artificial intelligence are other areas in which we will be closer"

808650957324218369.text: "BPI and KFW have decided to work together to strengthen their support for innovative companies" #DirectPR

808650807281389568.text: "The French Tech was for the Germans the opportunity to see what could be done to support start-ups" #directPR

808650658199040000.text: #DirectPR "Without being organized, will Europe leave behind the tremendous opportunity that is digital?"

808650526011355136.text: #DirectPR "What is playing is decisive for our economies but also for Europe" @fhollande

808639096663011328.text: RT @fhollande: Traveling to Berlin, I spoke about the unacceptable humanitarian situation in Aleppo https://t.co/atxegVCZ1F

808633384004157440.text: #Alep @fhollande "Today the situation is even worse, we must act and we will act."

808633091191345152.text: #Alep @fhollande "I regretted that the international community does not provide the expected response after the use of chemical weapons."

808632783795060736.text: #Alep @fhollande "We have been too late politically, even though France and Germany have always been on the initiative"

808632612499714048.text: #Alep @fhollande "There is a humanitarian emergency, a humanitarian ultimatum we have to pronounce, it is our duty to act."

808632218843303938.text: . @ fhollande "We must allow that there are health infrastructures that can be protected, there are still some outside Aleppo"

808631936340164608.text: "The Russians will be responsible for a situation they helped create if they do nothing to allow access to help" @fhollande

808631626280407040.text: #Alep @fhollande "But, without the Russians, there is no Syrian regime with the ability to conduct operations."

808631394708623360.text: #Alep @fhollande "I do not confuse the Russians and the Syrian regime (1/2)

808631017275817984.text: . @ fhollande "This is what we will try to do with Turks & Russians, as they can put pressure on the regime"

808630570972487680.text: #Alep @fhollande "We must also allow access to humanitarian aid, so corridors must be protected."

808630294530113536.text: #Alep @fhollande "Our message is simple: we want to do everything to enable the evacuation of the population."

808630092373041156.text: #Alep @fhollande "Yesterday, I received representatives of the moderate opposition but especially the humanitarian organizations still in Aleppo."

808629866346188802.text: #Alep @fhollande "These people are victims of repression and even risk their lives if they try to get out of Aleppo."

808629617657528320.text: #Alep @fhollande "120,000 people are being held hostage, there is no other word, they are being bombed."

808629219513270273.text: #Alep @fhollande "The Security Council is blocked because the Russians are vetoing the humanitarian situation is unacceptable."

802161331298271232.text: "The risk is in the everyday reality of being a police officer, you have to show exceptional courage and dedication"

801486680414941184.text: RT @fhollande: France when she has this desire to recover, she wins! https://t.co/HP4gnhXsYv

801474033980149760.text: "Arc is today a flagship and a reference" @fhollande #DirectPR

801473901083639808.text: "France when it fights and finds solutions, when the state does its duty, it wins and you won" @fhollande #DirectPR

801473651220606980.text: "We are in a pivotal moment for Arc, the company is saved, we must succeed the next step with new investments"

801473234227122176.text: "We must continue to support the innovation that is developing here and everywhere in France" @fhollande #DirectPR

801473015070474241.text: "Here the #CICE and the pact of responsibility counted, without it there would have been no taker" @fhollande #DirectPR

801472829552283649.text: "When I arrived in 2012, I noticed the state of disrepair of the industry and the social plans that had been retained so far"

801472507370962944.text: "The future of Arc is the future of the entire region.You represent a quarter of salaried employment in the territory of Saint-Omer" #DirectPR

801472191871197184.text: "The big question is how to finance a company like yours, you have to go through the Caisse des dépôts, the @Bpifrance"

801471894633480192.text: "To those who want to put customs barriers everywhere, you have to ask: who would we sell to? We need to export" #DirectPR

801471605041983488.text: "That's also why it was important to recognize the hard work in calculating pensions" @fhollande #DirectPR

801471399684608001.text: "Employees who started young and have paid enough should be able to retire, it will be imaginative"

801471154661847040.text: "You talk today of recruitments when we spoke yesterday of dismissals" @fhollande #DirectPR

801471025624023040.text: "It's because there was a gathering of all forces, investors, employees, state, that you managed" @fhollande #DirectPR

801470836276346881.text: "If there were no more state, officials in the state, who would have taken that responsibility?" @fhollande #DirectPR

801470668483203072.text: "PHP the buyer has invested € 85 million, the banks have cleared 90% of the debt and the state has granted a loan of € 49 million"

801470236025356289.text: "The solution was to find a new shareholder but it also took a financial effort" @fhollande #DirectPR

801470061500366857.text: "The state has taken responsibility by fetching a buyer, believing that it was impossible to let jobs disappear"

801469825667268615.text: "In 2014 the question arose as to whether the company would survive, it was necessary to find a buyer" @fhollande #DirectPR

801469676303814656.text: "And I'm coming back today to Arques, a world famous city thanks to your company Arc" @fhollande #DirectPR

801469536830705664.text: "I came to Liévin also for the laying of the foundation stone of the reserves of @MuseeLouvreLens" @fhollande #DirectPR

801469068817600512.text: "Today the camp was evacuated and this allowed to receive these refugees in dignified reception centers" "@fhollande #DirectPR

801468827368378368.text: "I came to the region a few weeks ago before dismantling the Lande camp" @fhollande #DirectPR

800044098459672576.text: . @ fhollande "we are the same together, faced with hardships, when France was united, it was irresistible"

800043713280016384.text: . @ fhollande "What must count is the vision of the future, not the return to the past but a confidence to give for the gathering"

800043497818587137.text: . @ fhollande "France has been able to make itself respected and act, to take responsibility in recent years. France has been up to the task"

800043130116444161.text: @ fhollande "temptations are visible in all democracies There is this illusion that locked up we would be stronger"

800042849505046529.text: @ fhollande "I also see the tremendous commitment of the citizens, in case of hardships, we see public service and mobilization"

800042630931513344.text: @ fhollande "citizens, rightly, want to be more involved in decision making, there needs to be a profound change in this area"

800042400970342401.text: @ fhollande "we must gather around education, research, preparing for the future around the climate challenge"

800042212931338241.text: . @ fhollande "the metropolises are assets but they must associate the popular districts."

800042011214680064.text: @ fhollande "Sustainable development is the third issue, it is decisive, what is at stake in all this is national cohesion"

800041786618028032.text: @ fhollande "what will make the difference in globalization is training"

800041640144420864.text: @ fhollande "lifelong learning is a big issue."

800041474763161600.text: @ fhollande "the second issue is education, we have struggled against stalling, we must go for excellence for all."

800041029068029952.text: . @ fhollande "France must come together, the first issue is investment, whether public or private, we need to invest more."

800040731045871616.text: . @ fhollande "we need a Europe that makes itself respected, prepares its future, decides on its own without waiting for anything from its US ally"

800040481862209537.text: . @ fhollande "nationalism is withdrawal, we have to make the right decisions about these threats"

800040304514629636.text: . @ fhollande "when some wanted to impose austerity policies and exclude Greece, I made sure to defend solidarity"

800040037907722240.text: "Authoritarianism is not authority, it is arbitrariness, the whole national" France carries a flame that illuminates the world "

800039392479944705.text: @ fhollande "fanatics betray a religion to distil the poison of intolerance"

800038999888904193.text: . @ fhollande "As I speak, Aleppo is being destroyed, the threats are there, you have to face the world"

800038742413234176.text: . @ fhollande "France is here to liberate, to carry its values, its ideals."

800038605104312320.text: @ fhollande "our territory is attractive, it is the reality of what our country, your country is."

800038559080189952.text: @ fhollande "we have to fight against the spirit of denigration, we will end up forgetting our strengths and our strengths"

800038204254523392.text: @ fhollande "Unemployment is shrinking, it's time but it's still too high in our country, so do not give up"

800038050185220096.text: @ fhollande "I know that efforts have been requested and there is still anger, there are so many inequalities to fight."

800037783746347008.text: . @ fhollande "What is being done here shows that new technologies benefit all territories, even those who feel remote"

800037430367752192.text: . @ fhollande "at COP21, the Paris Agreement has been signed, it is irreversible and the people will make sure that we are at the rendezvous"
